    Handling factor levels

    Functions for common factor operations (probably duplicating some elements of the forcats package).

    na_ref()

    Create Factor with NA as Reference

    sort_factor()

    Create Sorted Factor

    Predictive modeling utility functions

    model_metrics()

    Calculate Model Metrics

    threeway_formula()

    Convert a threeway formula into distinct sub-formulas

    Python virtual environment utility functions

    Functions for working with Python virtual environments with RStudio on Windows.

    repl_python_virtualenv()

    Open Python REPL in virtual environment

    virtualenv_create_win()

    Create Python virtual environment

    win_dir()

    Translate filepaths to Windows style
